programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 75
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. programme.desc: How fats can reset and rebalance the body; how friendly fats can actually keep cravings in check.

programme.desc: In Brooms Town, Peter and his friends have great fun and exciting adventures. programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir - EP 2
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth - who wants to steal their Miraculouses - from wreaking havoc on the town.

programme.title: One Warrior S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: A travel series talent search which aims to discover new martial arts talent across the globe, providing promising young athletes with the platform to unleash their martial arts greatness. Season 3 sees Rich Franklin and the team travelling across Japan, Thailand, Korea, Singapore and Australia to uncover the next ONE Superstar.

programme.desc: Bat Pat and his human friends seek to unravel the mysteries of the scary creatures that lurk about in Fogville, always discovering that the supernatural characters aren't evil - just loveable and misunderstood! Based on the best-selling book franchise.

programme.title: Horrid Henry S4 - EP 0009 & 0010
programme.desc: For Horrid Henry, life is just not fair! He feels that the rest of the world is against him and he wages a constant war against the tyranny of adults. Like any headstrong young boy, he is determined, relentless, he doesn't hold back and he never admits defeat!

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 1
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: When we think about the needs of others, we end up benefitting ourselves. Sounds like something from your Social Studies class? Well, it is Maths actually, Game Theory to be exact. In this episode, we look at the Maths behind why it is better to be considerate, to co-operate and to forgive; why making others lose out hurts us instead; and how understanding all this can help us predict natural disasters.

programme.title: Sharknado 4: The 4th Awakens
programme.desc: Five years after the wave of sharknados that wracked the east coast, our heroes are living a quiet life in the middle of the country -- as far away from sharks as possible. But when a freak sand sharknado hits Vegas, Fin is thrown back into action, fighting sharknados on a cross-country race to save his family and the world -- as all mankind should know by now, there is no escaping...

programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 26
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 24
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy makes a new furry friend and the Sky Shakers decide to name it Fox. The Henchmen set out to find the Craton and morph into human form. They approach Andy's house and meet with Andy's mother. Nat suggests that the Sky Shakers visit Uncle Ong, the lab assistant who works at their school, in an attempt to find out what the sphere might be. The SORA agent researches more about Andy and Sandy as she suspects that they know about the mysterious crash.

programme.desc: (R) Tiger, Jielun and Feifei are best friends. Lingling, the trio's study group leader finds them her worst nightmare because they are not interested in their studies. However, as soon as the fire on the matchstick extinguishes, their wishes and illusions vanish. Lingling urges them to stop by telling them that the desires are just illusions, and wants them to face reality and work hard. Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)Tiger, 哲伦 和菲菲是死党。小组长玲玲聪明伶俐，不喜欢三人在学业上差劲的态度。有一天，Tiger 遇见一位给他"快乐火柴"的科学家。"快乐火柴"能够给三人无限的快乐，三人要什么就有什么。可是，当火柴一熄灭，他们的欲望和理想都会消失。玲玲劝他们脚踏实地，面对现实。三人会否听她的劝告改过自新还是死不悔改呢？.

programme.desc: (R) Water is the basis of all beings and a vital resource to mankind. Lee Teng will show viewers the types of water and the origins. (重)水，万物之本，人类最重要的资源。首先，李腾将带领观众认识水的种类及来源，接着前往马来西亚及日本，进一步了解何谓天然矿泉水。最后回返新加坡，看看缺乏天然淡水资源的岛国，如何凭借科技工艺，让国人安心用水。.

programme.title: 翻乡找味 Taste Of Nanyang - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) In this last episode, the four dialect groups that participate in the last round of competition are Teochew, Hokkien, Canto and Hakka. The two dialect groups with the highest scores will challenge the final round and incorporate the three elements "Poetry, Wine and Flower" into their creative dish. The dish which meets the criteria of taste, cooking skill, setting and creativity will be the winner of this series. (重)《翻乡找味》最后一集主题为"琴棋书画诗酒花"。四组晋级的籍贯为：潮州、福建、广东和客家。4组人将各别面对以"琴棋书画"主题的挑战，考验大家对地方乐器和中国象棋的认识、传统且精致的书籍装帧、以及挑战一笔画生肖。两组成功过关的籍贯，进入最后回合，把"诗酒花"三大元素融入自创菜肴中，达到口感、厨艺、摆盘和创意，4大评分标准夺得最后的胜利。.

programme.title: 新过番客 A Sojourn Home - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series documents how some make it big and return home with affluence, while others are disappointed and forced to leave crestfallen. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

(重)在最后一集的节目中，不爱吃豆腐的姐妹俩在主持人的协助下，不仅煮出与炸薯条口感相似的炸豆干条，还吃得津津有味！她们也走访豆腐工厂，了解豆腐的制作过程。最后，姐妹俩合作无间，完成了难度颇高的客家酿豆腐！.

programme.title: 孤男寡女 Yours Fatefully - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Xin Xin and Xiao Yi are two lonely souls in the city. Xin Xin is a professional makeup artist living with her mum who suffers from anxiety disorder. Xiao Yi is a professional photographer living with his father who suffers from night blindness. The two lonely souls remain unmarried due to their devotion to taking care of their parents. Worried about their future, Xin Xin and Xiao Yi went for matchmaking arranged by their family members. (重)心心和孝义是两个生活互不交叉的孤身男女。心心是个新娘化妆师，与患有焦躁症的母亲同住；孝义则是个摄影师，照顾患有夜盲症的父亲，两人都因为父母的关系而耽搁了婚姻。在朋友和家人的安排下，两人前往相亲….

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 5

Serious koi hobbyists and dealers from all over the world will religiously visit this area every year in October. Huang Jinglun takes a trip there to learn how to pick the dream koi and to accomplish his mission in escorting them back to Singapore safely. 锦鲤在日本被誉为水中的活宝石。每年10月是日本锦鲤收成季节，全世界的买家都飞往新潟县小千古市购买锦鲤。特派员黄靖伦也接受委托，到锦鲤之乡协助锦鲤运输，此外还要下泥池协助锦鲤收成和学习如何挑选名贵锦鲤。他能否完成任务？.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 8
programme.desc: "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. Every individual has their own characteristics and beliefs. Each of them are passionate about lives, and hold unique opinions about the society. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. “星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 17

Despite him turning back, he does not stay for Yichen. (PG)正斌被狄西佛打败，决定转换跑道，加入大型机车队，即将出发环游亚洲，来跟大家道别，逸晨看出正斌在逃避。离别之日，逸晨不舍，追着正斌的机车跑。正斌虽然回头，但最后还是离开了，逸晨伤心不已。.

programme.title: 魔女的法庭 Witch At Court - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Mayi suddenly felt lonely while recuperating in the hospital and kept messaging Zhenxu to help buy necessities for her. (PG13-性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)马翌在医院休养没人来探病；突然感到孤单，便不断传短讯给镇旭要他帮忙买日用品。镇旭的母亲高在淑怀疑马翌是她的病患失散的女儿，开始调查马翌。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.desc: (R) Yehua's celestial body is placed in a crystal coffin and buried in the Sea of Innocence. Despite his death, Yehua lives on in Baiqian's heart. Fengjiu also takes over as the Qingqiu female monarch. (PG)(重)夜华仙体放入水晶棺 ，下葬于无妄海. 。尽管夜华去世，但他还存在白浅的内心。凤九也登基为青丘女君。.

programme.title: 孤男寡女 Yours Fatefully - EP 2

(PG)(重)心心和孝义因为误会，相亲不欢而散。孝义加入婚纱店工作，与心心成为同事，彼此没有好脸色。孝义的姐姐孝莲担心孝义的婚事，先斩后奏，通过红娘公司物色了一个年轻越南新娘阮凤，要孝义和她结婚，孝义反对。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 282

programme.title: 千年来说对不起 Till We Meet Again - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Tu Di Gong found out that the antique copper mirror in Baixue's house is the demon-detector! Caiyue is overjoyed. She plans to use the demon-detector to reveal Yaojing's real identity and convinces him that he is Su Wukong. Tu Di Gong and Caiyue approach Baixue to borrow the mirror from her; however, Baixue refuses to lend the mirror to them. When both of them try to steal the mirror out, they discover that Bao Chenggong is the real Tangseng. (PG)(重)土地公无意中发现白雪家那面千年铜镜，竟然就是照妖镜！采月雀跃万分，决定利用照妖镜把耀进的真身孙悟空照出来，令他相信。土地公和采月往找白雪借铜镜，后者不肯。两人于是使计偷得照妖镜，却意外发现包成功才是唐僧！.

programme.title: 型男大主厨 2019 Stylish Man-The Chef 2019 - EP 3
programme.desc: "Stylish Man - The Chef" is a cooking contest program. programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 18
programme.desc: Yichen is concerned when she discovers Wenkai's bruise on his knee. Wenkai smiles and asks everyone not to worry. They both have similar symptoms of pretending to be happy despite facing immense stress and despair towards life. programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 那些年,我们一起玩的游戏 The Games We Played - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Bring the whole family on a trip down memory lane with a new gameshow that's guaranteed to make you nostalgic! Hosted by Mark Lee and Shane Pow, watch teams battle it out over games like "Pepsi Cola 1, 2, 3", "Goli", "Five Stone", "Chapteh" and "Zero Point"! Game locations include old places like Bras Basah Complex, Haw Par Villa and Pulau Ubin! (重)还记得那些年，我们一起玩的游戏吗？没有智能手机、没得上网的时代，我们打弹珠、跳Zero Point，踢毽子、抛五粒米，玩tikam-tikam⋯童年过得单纯又精彩！全新怀旧户外游戏节目，让李国煌与包勋评两位"老少配主持"，带大家去缅怀简旧日简单快乐的游戏时光！.

(重)据说在春秋战国楚文王时代，鱼圆是城乡人民招待客人不失体面的好菜肴。这一集要锁住的就是内加肉馅的传统手工福州鱼圆。看着萧家兄弟姐妹六人用了五十多年的功夫处理四种鱼，从去鱼皮，起鱼肉，打鱼浆，再以手工捏制出来一个个富有鲜甜独特口感的福州鱼圆，让人感受到这个传统手工小吃，迫切需要年轻的接班人来传承手艺。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In India, 400 women and children go missing every day, with many of those missing girls being trafficked for commercial sexual exploitation. After being rescued, the victims still have to face discrimination while their perpetrators go unpunished. (重)印度每天有400名妇孺人间蒸发。其中有好些是被人口贩卖份子推入火炕的少女。当失踪少女获救后，她们仍然得面对邻里的歧视。肇事者事后，却逍遥法外。.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Traditional medicine theories come into play in Korean herbal cuisine where certain food can be considered "medicine", and poisonous ingredients like sulfur and puffer fish are used to dispel ill health. Join us in this episode of Food Notes to discover the amazing world of Herbal Cuisine in Korea! (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 63
programme.desc: (R) Taizhen tells Xizhen about Yuncan having a child one day before the parents' meeting session. Xizhen is upset and turns up late the following day. Xizhen tells Yuncan that she will continue with the wedding if he promises to listen to her in future. Yuncan promises to be obedient. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)举行相见礼前一晚，太真将允灿有孩子的事告诉熙真。熙真受打击，大哭大闹，但没有将事情告知父母。相见礼当天，熙真迟迟未出现。正当政淑要离开时，熙真才到场。熙真对允灿说若他可以一辈子听她的话，就照原定计划结婚。允灿答应。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 64
programme.desc: (R) Shanying goes to Seoul to ask Yuzhen if he has found Haixiu. Shanying bumps into Guixi outside the hospital. She is sure that Guixi is the person who cheated her of a big sum of money years ago, causing her to be thrown out of the house by Junjiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)善英担心海秀，到首尔找宇真问他有何进展。善英在医院门口看到贵熙，紧抓着她不放，贵熙却否认认识善英。善英告诉宇真贵熙多年前骗走她的钱，害她被俊九赶出家门，从此跟海秀分开。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Mingji overhears that Wenzhi wants to get rid of Zhenghou as Zhenghou is actively searching for evidence and a recorded tape to clear his father's name. Mingji asks Wenhao to save Zhenghou. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明姬窃听到文植与他人的对话，知文植要处理掉正厚，因正厚为了要洗脱他父亲的杀人嫌疑罪，正积极地寻找证据和他父亲陈述案情时的录音带。明姬连忙找文浩求助，要他帮正厚脱离危险。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Dongyuan is unhappy when he witnesses the release of the cunning Wu Taiyuan and gets even more furious when Wu gives him a sinister smile. Yingxin wants to find out more about what happened in 1992, so she drums up courage to interview her biological mother, Mingji. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)东元在警局外见狡猾的吴泰源被无罪释放，感到不爽，又见泰源对他奸笑，更生气。英信为了了解92年所发生的事情真相，鼓起勇气去见亲生妈妈明姬，与她做采访。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 1
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 1
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. From slimy swamp worms to live delicacies, Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Philippines. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。 从粘糊糊的沼泽蠕虫到生活美食，Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去菲律宾品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 3
programme.desc: After serving time in prison, Taijun's life is turned upside down and wallows in sorrows as his son passes away and his wife leaves him. At the same time, Yisheng is cheated of all his money by Yingmin, a stocks guru and a scammer. When Yisheng finds out that Yingmin is related to Dong-Kang Pharmaceutical's stock manipulation, he asks Taijun for help. The team of five decides to work together again to reclaim the victims' money. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太骏在监狱服刑出来后，生活变得颠倒，儿子去世，妻子离开了他, 他陷入了悲伤之中。 同时，义声被股神骗子英民骗走了他所有的钱， 当义声发现英民与东江制药的股票操纵有关时，义声去寻找太骏帮忙，五人小组决定再次合作，以收回他和其他受害者的钱。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 3
programme.desc: Kai En, and a reluctant Shi Ping, help Ah Boon, a ghost who struck the lottery but died before he had a chance to cash in his winning ticket. In the course of completing their mission, Kai En is angry to discover that 748 has reneged on his deal with her. (PG-灵异题材)凯恩带着不甚乐意的世平帮助烂赌鬼阿文。阿文赢了彩票头奖，可是在来得及领取奖金之前就死掉了。成功完成任务后，凯恩发现原来748 只是在利用她。她非常愤怒。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) It's all about braving the heat of the grill on Food Empire this week! For Singapore's BBQ experts, the searing heat is their trusty companion as they dish out Singapore's humble otah, BBQ stingray and satay! Singapore's craving for that beautiful old flame must be satisfied! (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak explores the processing of coconuts & coconut milk production in Thailand and milk source & milk processing in Australia. Cui Fang also learns about the cultivation of mangoes and production of dried mangoes in Philippines as well as tasting the Naxi's chickpea jelly in Yunnan. (重)在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往泰国尖竹汶府一窥椰子的加工和椰浆的制作。他也来到澳大利亚了解牛奶的取得及加工。林翠芳则前往菲律宾体验芒果的种植和芒果干的制作，并来到云南体验纳西文化品尝鸡豆凉粉。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Social Networks allow men and women to interact more, leading to more extramarital affairs. Many are willing to pay for mistress-dissuaders to restore their marriages and husbands faith. What do mistress-dissuaders do, and what are the skills needed? Let's find out more with the host in China. (重)发达的社交网络催生了异性之间更多相互接触的机会，使得婚姻出轨的现象更为严重。许多人为了挽救婚姻，挽回丈夫的心，不惜重金礼聘“小三劝退师"来帮忙。究竟“小三劝退师"的工作是什么？要把小三给劝退，需要什么本事？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到中国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Every year, 6 out of 10 Philippinos whom died from illness, are still denied of medical attention at their deathbeds. Jojo Goh travels to Philippines, an isolated and typhoon-prone Sabtang island with less than 2000 villagers. She discovers the many hats worn by the only doctor serving there. (重)每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 65
programme.desc: (R) Tongbai gives Xiubin a call and gives away her whereabouts. Yuzhen drowns his sorrows with wine after he is rejected by Haixiu. programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan visits Yuzhen's family. She is vexed when Zhufeng keeps referring to Haixiu as Yuzhen's prospective wife. Xiuzi overhears the conversation between Yiyuan and Yuzhen. She is shocked when Yiyuan states that she wants Yuzhen to move in with her after marriage. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑以准媳妇的身份到宇真家拜访。洙峰一直认为海秀是宇真交往的对象，令艺苑不开心。秀子听到宇真和艺苑的对话，知道艺苑要宇真婚后搬到她家住。秀子问宇真是否真的要入赘，宇真说就算如此也是预料之内的事，所以他不反对。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 23

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 24

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 6
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 4

programme.title: 新语研究所 Fun With SINGnese - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Fun with SINGnese is an infotainment series that explores the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses how the terms An Pai (plainclothes police), Zai Hu (clerk) and Hei You Tong (black oil tank) came about, and why Queen Elizabeth Walk used to be called "Gor Zhang Chiu Kar". (重)《新语研究所》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么便衣警探俗称为暗牌，办公室文员叫做财副？为什么旧时把放荡的女人叫做黑油桶？为什么康乐通道俗称为五丛树脚？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Despite bearing the responsibility of looking after the household, women are also putting more focus on their careers. Is this burden too much for women to bear? Exactly how will they strike this balance? Let us investigate on how men and women determine their level of happiness in life! (重)要照顾家庭又要兼顾事业，现代女人压力非常大！所以女人到底快乐吗？女人同时希望做个独立自主，但又渴望依赖男人；究竟女人应该怎么平衡两性关系？且看男人女人如何为自己的快乐指数打分，记得收看这一集的节目！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Hengshun wants to come clean with Caili, but his plan is disrupted when he has to attend an interview urgently. Hengshun is happy when he assumes that he has been employed as an executive. He is taken aback when he is informed on his first day of work that he is employed as a chauffeur. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨顺打算向采莉坦白，但却在关键时刻接获面试通知，于是错失坦白的机会。亨顺以为自己受聘为业务员，开心地跟家人分享，上班的第一天才发现自己是受雇为司机。亨奎失望，但为了赚钱，也只好答应担任哲雄的司机。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Nali thinks hard of ways to bring Huaxing to the hospital for examination and breast cancer radiation therapy. Zhengyuan takes measurement of Nali to tailor make her clothing and shoes. He says he will sponsor unique dresses for Nali's broadcasting programs in future. Nali feels very grateful. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽苦思冥想如何才能带华信来医院检查, 接受乳癌放射性治疗。正元为娜丽量码做衣服和鞋子，表示以后要为她做独一无二的衣服赞助她上节目，让娜丽十分感激。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 9
programme.desc: Meizhu is displeased when Chengjun gives her the cold shoulder but appears very concerned about Tongxi. Chengjun does not react positively when Meizhu asks him to marry her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊一直对美珠冷冷淡淡，却很担心彤熙，令美珠很不是滋味。美珠要成俊跟她结婚，成俊没有立刻答应。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 10
programme.desc: Xishu gives Zhixun a scolding when he does not attain her expectations in the preliminary exams. Changzhu and Huizhu try to protect Zhixun but fail. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)熙淑发现志勋在学校的模拟考只考到全校第三，没有达到她的要求，于是对他又打又骂。昌洙和慧珠尝试劝熙淑不要对志勋太苛刻，却不成功。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 12
programme.desc: Aidan finds Nadia who is barely alive and wants to send her to the hospital. Nadia decides to tell him her secret; that she was the original "True Liar". It turns out that Aidan is actually a figment of Nadia's lies to begin with; a creation of her lies. (PG)(大结局)Aidan发现奄奄一息的Nadia，急忙要送她到医院，Nadia却要告诉他一个秘密，原来她是大话精，Aidan是她撒谎编造的人，是她创造出来的！Aidan晴天霹雳。。。.

programme.title: 迴轉幹探 Life On Mars - EP 2
programme.desc: Despite being confused about his current situation, Taizhu works hard with the detectives in 1988 to solve a murder case. He has a hard time accepting the way detective Jiang Dongzhe handles the suspects. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)虽然处在迷惑的状态，泰柱尽力与姜东哲组长，尹娜英，李龙基和赵南植等刑警联手追逐案件真相，东哲粗鲁的办案方式让泰柱不以为然。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Fushi's colleagues speculate that she applied for leave to take care of her unwell boyfriend. The curious Mary looks up Fushi and unexpectedly discovers that she is staying with Louis. Mary asks Fushi out to find out more about her relationship with Louis. She is surprised to hear that Louis is suffering from amnesia. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)福实请假没上班，同事们说她是为了男朋友生病而请假。好奇的玛丽去找她，意外地发现她跟路易住在一起。玛丽约福实出来想打探她和路易的关系，得知路易患上失忆症后感到很惊讶。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan asks Fushi and Louis to stay at his house temporarily for safety reason when he hears about the murder attempt at Fushi's house. Fushi and Louis move into Zhongyuan's house. Louis is jealous when he sees how caring Zhongyuan is towards Fushi. He warns Fushi not to fall in love with Zhongyuan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)中元得知福实家发生谋杀未遂事件后，为了安全起见，要福实和路易暂时住在他家。福实和路易搬到中元的家，路易见中元很照顾福实，知道中元喜欢福实，便吃醋地叫福实不可以喜欢上中元。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 十大新加坡 Top 10 Singapore - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Every driver has a horror story to tell when it comes to parking in Singapore. Though multi-storied car parks are the norm in land-scarce Singapore, some are notoriously narrow and hard to navigate. Find out on "Top 10 Singapore" which car park even our most toughened road warriors fear the most. (重)每个驾车人士心目中都有一份"可怕的停车场"的清单。请问你的清单上，叫你心惊胆跳、避而远之的停车场有哪些呢？而让你害怕的原因又是什么？想不想知道由100人票选出来的本地最具挑战性的停车场是哪一个？请记得收看《10大新加坡》。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Xuncai and Zhen-ai are locked up in the basement of Yingshan's house accidentally. Xuncai was kidnapped once when he was a child and thus appears to be very scared of the dark and enclosed basement. Zhen-ai hugs him to put him at ease. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)勋才和真爱被关在英善家的地下室。勋才小时候曾被绑架，对密闭的地下室有不好的回忆，于是表现得很害怕。真爱抱着勋才安慰他。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Colleagues of the TV station run into Nali and Huaxing seeing each other frequently and rumours that they are dating spread. Huaxing has mixed feelings as he sees Nali actively clarifying that it isn't so. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)电视台的同事碰见娜丽和华信频密见面，开始传出娜丽和华信交往的传闻了。华信看着娜丽积极地解释这不是事实，心情错综复杂。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 11
programme.desc: Xishu scolds Zhixun in public when his exam results are not up to her expectations. The hurt Zhixun refuses to go for classes and also refuses to go home with Xishu. Xishu blames Huizhu and Changzhu for Zhixun's behaviour. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)熙淑因为志勋的成绩没有达到她的标准而在大庭广众骂他。志勋觉得委屈，不肯读书，也不肯跟熙淑回家。熙淑为此怪慧珠将她的过去说出来，害志勋突然不听她的话，也怪昌洙带坏志勋。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 12
programme.desc: Chengjun spends a night with Tongxi at the library to protect her from the loansharks. He sympathizes Tongxi even more when she tells him about her difficult childhood. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊载彤熙到图书馆去，发现高利贷业者在找寻她的下落，于是马上去保护彤熙。两人为了避开高利贷业者被迫在图书馆度过一夜。成俊从谈话中发现彤熙经历过很困苦的童年，更加心疼彤熙。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 7
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak learns about the cultivation & processing of basil in Chiang Mai and explores the rearing & butchery of antibiotic-free pigs in Taiwan. He also learns about the grading standards of Wagyu beef in Japan, while Cui Fang is in Korea to find out the secrets of Korean chilli sauce. 在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往泰国清迈了解罗勒的种植和加工，并前去台湾一探无毒猪的养殖和分切。他也前往日本了解了和牛的分级标准，享受了一顿和牛大餐。林翠芳则前去韩国发掘韩式辣椒酱的奥秘。.

programme.title: 迴轉幹探 Life On Mars - EP 3
programme.desc: Detective Jiang deduces the current case they are working on is suicide but Taizhu thinks otherwise. Taizhu's handling of cases displeases his team members but his brilliant knowledge inspires them. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)案发现场东哲很快就做出了死者是自杀的结论，但是泰柱却不同意他的看法。泰柱的做事风格让他被同事排挤，但他来自未来的知识让众人不得不尊敬他。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Shanqiu visits Zhongyuan's house in the middle of the night suddenly. Zhongyuan, Fushi and Louis panic. Shanqiu hypocritically tells Zhongyuan that staff in the company are spreading rumours about him and Fushi engaging in an affair. Shanqiu plans to post Fushi out to the Shanghai branch office to douse the rumours. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)善求突然在夜晚出现在中元家，令中元、福实和路易感到惊惶，连忙躲起来。善求假意地告诉中元公司里的人都在传福实和中元有染的谣言。为了要帮中元避嫌，善求打算安排福实去上海分公司工作。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Fushi moves back to her own house after the arrest of the murderer. Louis continues to live at Fushi's house. Zhongyuan feels a sense of loss and loneliness without Fushi and the troublesome Louis. Fushi and Rencheng approach officer Zhunhe to file a report for Louis and are shocked to realise that Louis is the heir of the Huangjin Group. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)由于警方已经捉到了杀人犯了，福实于是向中元道谢，搬回自己的家住，而路易则继续寄居在福实家。中元的家少了福实和麻烦精路易，让他感到有点失落和寂寞。福实和仁成去找准赫刑警申报路易失踪案，才知路易原来是黄金集团的继承人。.

programme.title: 注定 Show Hand - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Do we lead a fated life or do we decide our own destiny? Cast: Christopher Lee, Chew Chor Meng, Cynthia Koh, Ann Kok, Ian Fang, Kimberly Chia. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)人生每一个关口的决定，是早就被'注定'了，还是等待自己来'决定'呢？演员: 李铭顺, 周初明, 许美珍, 郭舒贤, 方伟杰, 谢静仪。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) The Vietnam War has left behind traumatic suffering and haunting nightmare to the Vietnamese people. It is also like a spell, casting heavy shackle on them which they are unable to break free. Is being regretful the biggest punishment in life for the war pushers or the helpless Agent Orange victims? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)越战留给了越南百姓一扇无法启齿的伤痛窗口，带给他们的是一种挥之不去的梦魇，更像是一种咒语，给他们套上了沉痛的枷锁，使他们无法撑脱。人生最大的惩罚是后悔，是战争的推使者，抑或是没得选择的橙剂受害者呢？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Junying steals important and confidential documents from Hengkui's office as revenge. Zhen-ai discovers that Shanyu is working as a housemaid when she bumps into Shanyu and Qinan at a supermarket. Zhen-ai is ashamed of Shanyu's part-time job. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)俊英趁亨奎外出时到亨奎的办公室，看到档案柜的密码，然后在深夜洗劫亨奎的办公室，把重要的资料拿走。英善带着真爱到购物中心巡视，碰到带着珊玉去购物的琪南。真爱发现珊玉是帮佣，觉得既丢脸又很心疼。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Nali feels a little upset when she reads news on internet that Zhengyuan and news anchor Jingxiu is in love. Zhengyuan does not see Nali when he visits the TV station. He approaches Huaxing for news of Nali and asks him for help to clarify to Nali about the gossip. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽看到了网上正元和新闻主播晶秀热恋的消息，有点难过。正元来到电视台却没有看到娜丽，他到顶楼向华信询问娜丽的消息，并让他帮忙找娜丽解释绯闻。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 13
programme.desc: Changzhu piggybacks Zhixun to the hospital when he faints suddenly. Zhixun is diagnosed with septicemia due to a compromised immune system. Despite Zhixun's condition, however, Xishu insists that Zhixun does his best in an upcoming exam. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)志勋突然流鼻血又晕倒，昌洙立刻背他到医院去。志勋被诊断因压力过大，免疫力急速下降而患初期败血症。但尽管如此，熙淑还是要志勋努力应付即将来临的大考。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 14
programme.desc: Xishu wants Zhixun to be discharged from the hospital as soon as possible so that he can attend a pre-admission exam to gain entry to a prestigious boarding school. Zhixun wants to take his life as he feels unloved. His uncle stops him in time. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)熙淑希望志勋被有名望的寄宿学校录取，于是催促志勋赶紧出院，去参加入学考试。志勋觉得母亲不关心自己，想自寻短见，被舅舅阻止。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 10
programme.desc: Heart disease is the 2nd biggest killer in Taiwan, with one person dying from it every 25 minutes. Danny Yeo meets with Taiwan's best cardiovascular doctors to access the operating theatre for the most critically ill. For some patients, securing a heart transplant is their last chance at a new life. (PG-部分画面令人不安)冠心病或俗称心脏病是台湾第二号杀手，每25分钟会有一人死于心脏病爆发。主持人杨君伟前往台北探访换过500颗心脏的名医，并探访在生死线上与心脏病抗争到底的病人。台湾人心脏病的高发率，问题到底出在哪里？.

programme.title: 迴轉幹探 Life On Mars - EP 4
programme.desc: Taizhu advises Detective Jiang not to be abusive towards his suspects and stops his men from concocting fake evidence against the suspects. The team are working on a pickpocketing case; Taizhu has to put his colleague, Naying at risk. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)泰柱劝姜东哲改掉对犯人的粗鲁态度，也阻止他们伪造证据的行为。在调查一起扒手案件，泰柱不得不叫娜英为诱饵.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan's parents assume that Zhongyuan is finally attached when they find female clothing at his house. Mary makes things difficult for Fushi on purpose when she is jealous of Fushi for receiving attention from both Zhongyuan and Louis. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)中元的父母在中元家中发现有女生的衣服，以为他有了女朋友，于是高兴不已。玛丽因忌妒福实一直得到中元和路易的关注而故意在公事上多加为难福实。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan knows Fushi is very sad about Funan's death in an accident. He worries about Fushi living alone back in the countryside so he goes and look for her. Louis cannot contact Fushi and is very worried. Housekeeper Jin accompanies him to Fushi's house and they find nobody there. They ask Rencheng for news of Fushi. When Louis finds out that Fushi has returned to the countryside, he wants to go look for her there at once. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)中元知道福实因为福南出车祸去世十分伤心，放心不下她一人回乡生活，便去找她。路易一直联络不到福实，担心到茶饭不思。金管家只好陪他去福实家。他们找不到人，便去向仁成打听福实的消息。当路易知道福实回乡下后，立刻要去找她。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐”是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Be it in the East or West, pickles may look plain and ordinary but its the embodiment of the family harmony and everything that is beautiful. In this episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce a variety of Chinese pickles, Japanese and French pickles, Spanish pickled olives and Japanese miso. (重)不管是东方还是西方，腌渍品看似平淡无奇，却是平常百姓家庭和睦，万事和美的体现。这一集的节目，郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍各式各样的中国酱菜，日本和法国的腌渍品，西班牙的腌制橄榄和日本的味噌。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Hengkui's ex-classmate, Xianghe, has been holding a torch for Zhen-ai all these years. He is thrilled to finally catch up with Zhen-ai. Xuncai passes by and mistakes Xianghe for taking photos of Zhen-ai secretly. Xuncai is jealous when Xianghe says Zhen-ai is his first love. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨奎偶遇旧同学相赫。相赫从以前就喜欢真爱，现在仍对真爱着迷。相赫在得到真爱的同意后拍她的照片。勋才路过，以为相赫偷拍真爱，要相赫把照片删掉。真爱前来化解两人的误会，相赫说真爱是他的初恋，勋才吃醋，不满。.

programme.desc: (R) Zhengyuan tells Jingxiu directly that they cannot get married as he likes Nali instead of her. To his surprise, Jingxiu quickly agrees to help to break off their engagement. An agent calls Huaxin and tells him that there is a suitable house available near Lihong's house. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正元直接了当告诉晶秀他们俩不能结婚，因为他不喜欢她，并坦荡地表示自己喜欢娜丽。令他感到出乎意料的是，晶秀很快地同意帮忙解除婚约。房产中介打电话给华信，表示李红家附近有合适的房子了。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 15
programme.desc: Dr. Jiang suspects that Zhixun and Changzhu are switched after comparing their blood types with that of their respective set of parents. He suggests that the boys, as well as their parents, undergo DNA paternity tests to determine who the boys' parents are. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)姜院长对照志勋、昌洙和他们父母的血型，发现孩子们可能对调了。姜院长建议为孩子们做亲子鉴定。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 16
programme.desc: The DNA tests confirm that Zhixun and Changzhu have indeed been switched when they were infants. Xishu does not want to accept the test results and demand for another test to be done. The elders in the family soon get wind of the incident. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定结果显示志勋和昌洙果真对调了。熙淑不肯接受检验结果，要重新做亲子鉴定。很快的，炯燮、静爱、美玉等人都知道孩子对调的事了。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 5
programme.desc: Why do people vanish without a trace? According to reports, there are more than 2000 cases of missing people being filed yearly in Singapore. While most missing individuals are eventually found safe and sound, some remain disappeared. In this episode, we delve into the stories that took place here. 新加坡没有普遍性的人口失踪现象，但是每年仍然有人不声不响地从我们身边消失。据报道，警方每年接获2000多宗失踪案。失踪的原因是什么？失踪的人背后，都承载了那些隐情？留下来的人又将何去何从？.

programme.title: 迴轉幹探 Life On Mars - EP 5
programme.desc: A village Chief is found dead in a field. Detective Jiang arrested a lady, Liu Shunxi, who confesses that she is the murderer but Taizhu thinks otherwise. He suspects she is lying to protect someone. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)一名村长被发现死在草原里，姜东哲逮捕女子刘顺希，自己也承认是凶手。泰柱却不以为然，觉得她在撒谎保护某人。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)路易知福实因弟弟福南在那场车祸代替他死去后非常痛苦不想见到他，便照奶奶的建议在远方观察并支持福实。善求约路易见面，用借口看他的记忆到底恢复到什么程度了。.

programme.title: 购物王路易 Shopaholic Louis - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) During a thunderstorm, Louis worries that Fushi, who is afraid of thunder, might get sick in this kind of weather. He braves the rain to buy some medicine and runs to Fushi's house. He stops on his way there when he sees Zhongyuan doing the same thing... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)外面下着大雨又打雷，路易想起了害怕下大雨打雷的福实，十分担心她一遇到这种气候就会大病一场，便冒着雨买了药跑去福实家。路易在途中见到中元也冒雨拿着药去福实家而止步了。。。。。。.

programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) On Halloween Night, bar waitress Feifei found out her boyfriend was cheating on her, and she got into a catfight with the mistress. Upset and embarrassed, she decided to drink herself numb, and ended up on Cavenagh Bridge where she met a strange man. This man was Mr Zhu, a scholar from Ming dynasty who accidentally time-travelled to present day Singapore. A heartbroken drunk lady and a man from another world started an interesting conversation... (PG)(重)(大结局)万圣节之夜，啤酒女菲菲发现男友劈腿，和小三大打出手，并且喝得烂醉收场。在回家途中，经过加纹纳桥，竟然遇上从明朝穿越过来的朱秀才！一个失恋之际，喝得糊里糊涂，一个来自古代，人生地不熟，两人鸡同鸭讲，却也交谈甚欢，互相欣赏。等到翌日酒醒后，菲菲才依稀记得自己似乎发起酒疯，把朱秀才推下河！可是，记忆模糊，片段零星，完全不能确定昨晚发生的事到底是自己的一番姻缘奇遇，还是南柯一梦？.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 18

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 6
